name: In Good Hands
description:
In Good Hands

It's a small world after all. You hold the fate of the people in your hands by controlling the rotation of this surreal world. Navigate from bears, storms, and other natural disasters for the greater good. Try using lightning to stop the bears from killing your people. Sometimes even small worlds have big problems.

This game was developed in a 72 hour time frame for Ludum Dare 38!

Ludum Dare 38

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/in-good-hands

Controls:

Left mouse drag to rotate the world.

Right mouse drag to rotate everything.

Middle mouse to zoom.

You control the rotation of the world and universe to protect the people from getting killed. Use the lightning storms and meteors to prevent the bears from killing the people; all the while avoiding hitting the people.
